de.hs_duesseldorf.medien.mi.httphsdronelog.hsdronelog.network.request.parser

Class JSONRequestParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hs_duesseldorf.medien.mi.httphsdronelog.hsdronelog.network.util.NetworkRequestParser
      • de.hs_duesseldorf.medien.mi.httphsdronelog.hsdronelog.network.request.parser.JSONRequestParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONReaderListener

    public class JSONRequestParser
extends NetworkRequestParser
implements JSONReaderListener
    The Json Request Parser class can parse a json formatted string received by a network request from a HSDroneLog web server. It parses the json with help of the JSONReader and saves the data in a format the NetworkListener can deal with.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean deletedImages 
      private String m_currentJsonArrayName
      The name of the current json array which is read
      private Map<String,String> m_currentJsonObjectMap
      A map to save the parsed data of the current json object of the data array.
      private int m_jsonArrayDeepness
      The counter how many arrays are currently open in the data array.
      private JSONReader m_jsonReader
      The JSONReader object to read the json formatted raw string and to get the single elements of the json formatted string.
      private boolean m_jsonStatementsInDataArray
      This value is true if the json statement which is parsed is in the json data array
      private String m_jsonStringBufferForElementsArray
      A buffer to safe all elements of an array which is in the data array.

      • parse

        protected void parse(String rawResult)
        Description copied from class: NetworkRequestParser
        Just for internal use. Call NetworkRequestParser.parseRawResult(NetworkThread, String) instead. This method starts the process of parsing in the subclass.
        Specified by:
        parse in class NetworkRequestParser
        Parameters:
        rawResult - The raw result from a network url request.
